channel.title: image optimization on Konigi
channel.description: Recent content in image optimization on Konigi

item.title: ImageOptim: PNG/JPEG/GIF optimizer for Mac OS X
item.description: ImageOptim is a free Macintosh application that optimizes images so they take up less disk space and load faster. It finds the best compression parameters and by removing unnecessary comments and color profiles. It handles PNG, JPEG and GIF animations. Via @chrismessina http://imageoptim.pornel.net/
